name: Cheesy Pepper Poppers
ingredients: Salsa or Cilantro Pepita Dressing & Dip (optional, for serving)

instructions.en: Trim off jalapeño stems, leaving the stem caps intact. Cut peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds and membranes
instructions.sk: Odrežte stonky jalapeño, ale nechajte vrchnáčiky stoniek. Rozrežte papriky pozdĺžne na polovicu a odstráňte semienka a blany
instructions.ja: ハラペーニョの茎を切り取り、茎の付け根は残す。縦半分に切り、種と薄皮を取り除く

instructions.en: Arrange the pepper halves on a large foil-lined baking sheet
instructions.sk: Rozložte polovice paprík na veľký plech vyložený alobalom
instructions.ja: アルミホイルを敷いた大きなベーキングシートにハラペーニョを並べる

instructions.en: Slice the cheese into 10-12 cross-wise slices. Cut or fold each slice in half and place one in each pepper half
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte syr na 10-12 priečnych plátkov. Každý plátok preložte alebo prerežte na polovicu a vložte do každej polovice papriky
instructions.ja: チーズを10〜12枚に輪切りにする。各スライスを半分に切るか折り、各ハラペーニョの半分に1枚ずつ置く

instructions.en: Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10-15 minutes or until cheese is bubbly and peppers are slightly tender but not mushy
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 190°C 10-15 minút alebo kým sa syr neroztopí a papriky nezmäknú, ale nie na kašu
instructions.ja: 375°F（190°C）で10〜15分、またはチーズが泡立ち、ピーマンが少し柔らかくなるまで（ふやけないように注意）焼く

instructions.en: If cheese has oozed out, scrape it up and put it back in the peppers
instructions.sk: Ak syr vytiekol, zoškrabte ho a vráťte späť do paprík
instructions.ja: チーズが溢れ出ていたら、掻き集めてハラペーニョに戻す

instructions.en: Serve with salsa or Cilantro Pepita Dressing & Dip, if desired
instructions.sk: Podávajte so salsou alebo Cilantro Pepita dressingom a dipom, ak chcete
instructions.ja: お好みでサルサまたはコリアンダーペピータドレッシング＆ディップを添えて提供する
